title: Voice annotation is adding { } around punctuation{period} What setting controls this?
content: When I annotate a message or any verbal input to text {comma} it adds brackets around my punctuation {period} I don't know how this setting got changed and I don't know how to fix it {period} please help {period} And I've received feedback from my recipients that it comes across in the brackets too {period} I can't seem to Google the problem to find an answer {period} So I'm hoping that someone in this community will know {period} Because it is very frustrating to have to go back through all of my messaging and replace what's in the message with an actual punctuation.
